entry.title: Friday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
